prompt:
Nurse: Wonderful, Mr. Valenzuela. I'm glad to hear that you're clear on this. If you have any questions later, feel free to ask. Now, I know I've shared a lot of information with you, but we're almost done. I just have 2 more questions for you. Before we proceed, do you have any questions about anything we've discussed so far?

Patient: No.

Nurse: Alright, Mr. Valenzuela. If you have any questions later, feel free to ask. Now, I'd like to ask if you've been experiencing any signs of illness. Have you had any fever, chills, or muscle aches recently?

Patient: No.

Nurse: That's good to hear, Mr. Valenzuela. It's important to be in good health for your procedure. Now, for my last question, have you arranged for a ride home after your procedure?

Patient: Yes.

Nurse: That's great to hear, Mr. Valenzuela. It's critical to have someone available to take you home after the procedure. If there's anything else you need to discuss or any questions you have, feel free to ask. [

Patient: I have no questions.

responses.gpt4: Alright, Mr. Valenzuela. Thanks for letting me know. That takes us to the end of the checklist I have for our call today. Is there anything else you're curious about or need more information on regarding your upcoming colonoscopy?
responses.our_model: Alright, Mr. Valenzuela. If you have any questions later, feel free to ask. That was all the topics for today. Before we end this call, do you have any other questions or concerns?
